While Seeker_E (#1 priority) is theoretically available, they prefer me last among the companies they listed, making a successful match with them difficult or unlikely. 
Therefore, accepting Seeker_B is the optimal strategy to maximize priority within the current round's constraints and opportunities. I will use my single quota on Seeker_B.
